TiDB heap memory size in use.

panels.description: TiDB query durations by histogram buckets with different percents.

panels.title: Failed Query OPS

panels.description: MySQL command processing numbers per second. See https://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/text-protocol.html and https://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/prepared-statements.html
panels.title: Command Per Second

panels.description: TiDB query total statistics including both successful and failed ones.
panels.title: CPS By Instance

panels.description: TiDB statement statistics.
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: MySQL command statistics by command type. See https://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/text-protocol.html and https://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/prepared-statements.html
panels.title: CPS by CMD

panels.description: The time cost of parsing SQL to AST
panels.title: Parse Duration

panels.description: The time cost of building the query plan
panels.title: Compile Duration

panels.description: The time cost of executing the SQL which does not include the time to get the results of the query .
panels.title: Execution Duration

panels.description: TiDB plan cache hit total.
panels.title: Queries Using Plan Cache OPS

panels.description: TiDB transaction processing counts by type.
panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Bucketed histogram of transaction execution durations, including retry.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: The max TiDB statements numbers within one transaction.
panels.title: Max Transaction Statement Num

panels.description: The max TiDB transaction retry count.
panels.title: Max Transaction Retry Num

panels.description: KV request durations by store (TiKV). It contains requests that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: KV Request Duration 99 by store

panels.description: KV request durations by request type. It contains requests that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: KV Request Duration 99 by type

panels.description: KV request count by request type. It contains requests that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: KV Request OPS

panels.description: TiDB total kv transaction counts. It contains transactions that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: KV Transaction OPS

panels.description: The max writes bytes of the transaction. It contains transactions that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: Max Transaction Write Size Bytes

panels.description: The max writes kv count of the transaction. It contains transactions that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: Max Transaction Write KV Num

panels.description: The max writes regions of the transaction. It contains transactions that are executed automatically by the internal background.
panels.title: Max Transaction Regions Num

panels.description: The duration of TiDB starts to wait for the TSO until received the TS result.
panels.title: PD TSO Wait Duration

panels.description: The duration of a client starting to wait for the TS until received the TS result.
panels.title: PD TSO RPC Duration

panels.description: TiDB auto-ID requests per second including single table/global auto-ID processing and single table auto-ID rebase processing.
panels.title: AutoID QPS

panels.description: TiDB auto-ID requests durations.
panels.title: AutoID Duration
